title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ to open a file with a different type of editor, the expected behavior is for the file to open in the new editor. However, when selecting the file 'test.xml' in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example is reactivated instead. It seems that searching for an existing open file does not consider editor types. The file 'test.xml' should open in a new editor, since the editor type is different.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for the file 'test.xml' in the Navigator, a new editor should open and display the content of the file.
SR:
1. Open the application and create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml' 
3. Select the file 'test.xml' in the Navigator
4. Right-click on the file and choose 'Open With...'
5. From the submenu, select 'Default Text Editor'
6. Verify that a new editor opens and displays the content of the file
